00016 class MdApp(Script):
00017     '''Driver for the md engines in DANSE.'''
00018     class Inventory(Script.Inventory):
00019         import pyre.inventory as pinv 
00020         mdEngine = pinv.facility('Molecular Dynamics Engine', default='gulp')
00021         mdEngine.meta['tip'] = 'which md engine to use'
00022         mdEngine.meta['known_plugins'] = ['gulp','mmtk']
00023         #mdEngine.validator=pinv.choice([Gulp(),Mmtk()])
00024

00026         Script.__init__(self, 'MdApp')

00029     def main(self, *args, **kwds):
00030         self.ii.mdEngine.execute()
